definition: an ornamental frill made by pressing pleats, make wavy with a heated goffering iron
details:
noun
- an ornamental frill made by pressing pleats
= synonyms: gauffer
- an iron used to press pleats and ridges
= synonyms: gauffer, goffering iron, gauffering iron
- a zealously energetic person, especially a salesman
= example: a zealously energetic person, especially a salesman
= synonyms: gopher
verb
- make wavy with a heated goffering iron
= example: make wavy with a heated goffering iron
= synonyms: gauffer
